text: The 1978-79 Austrian Cup was Austria's nationwide football cup competition. SSW Innsbruck were the defending champions. Austria Soccer == First round== First round with teams from the second league. == Round of 32== First round with teams from the first league. == Round of 16== == Quarter-finals == ==Semi-finals == == Final first leg== * SSW Innsbruck: Egon Katnik – Fernando Zappia (68. Werner Kriess), Ronald Freimüller, Gerhard Forstinger, Robert Auer, Walter Stöffelbauer, Werner Schwarz (68. Franco Castellano), Peter Schwarz, Günter Kronsteiner, Werner Zanon, Werner Seubert coach: Lajos Baróti *Admira/Wacker: Gerhard Fleischmann – Ferdinand Bartosch, Heinrich Strasser, Herbert Oberhofer, Robert Kro, Helmut Weigl, Hans-Peter Troindl, Johannes Demantke, Wilhelm Cerny, Ewald Gröss (69. Erich Kroboth), Alfred Gassner coach: Rudolf Illovszky == Final second leg== *Admira/Wacker: Gerhard Fleischmann – Ferdinand Bartosch, Heinrich Strasser (46. Erich Kroboth), Herbert Oberhofer, Helmut Weigl, Zenon Kasztelan (66. Hans-Peter Troindl), Johannes Demantke, Wilhelm Cerny, Walter Binder, Ewald Gröss, Alfred Gassner coach: Rudolf Illovszky * SSW Innsbruck: Egon Katnik – Robert Auer, Fernando Zappia, Ronald Freimüller, Gerhard Forstinger, Walter Stöffelbauer, Peter Schwarz, Günter Kronsteiner, Robert Hanschitz, Werner Zanon, Werner Seubert coach: Lajos Baróti ==Top scorer== Rank Player Club Goals 1 Günther Kronsteiner DSV Alpine / SSW Innsbruck 4 2 Peter Koncilia SSW Innsbruck 3 2 Johann Pigel Grazer AK 3 2 Karl Kodat SV Austria Salzburg 3 transfermarkt.at Torschützen (German) == References == Category:Austrian Cup Category:1970s in Austria Category:1978 in Europe Category:1979 in Europe
title: 1978–79 Austrian Cup
